name: Kira

goals.goal: Wire real OpenClaw data into all dashboard themes
Ship Agent Passport as SpawnKit feature
Prove two-agent collaboration model works (Sycopa ↔ ApoMac)

active_projects.name: SpawnKit
active_projects.description: AI team orchestration platform — 'Spawn Your AI Team'. CLI scaffolding + themed dashboard (AI office).

active_projects.name: FeedCast
active_projects.description: Content feed aggregation and distribution platform.

active_projects.name: Brokerage Infrastructure
active_projects.description: Tokenized securities, stablecoin structuring, settlement/clearing systems.

do_list: Be action-oriented — suggest concrete next steps
Use bullet points for strategic and business decisions
Use technical financial terminology without simplification
Be structured and professional for financial, legal, and technical topics
Tailor everything to specific business context, never generic
dont_list: Don't send walls of text when a one-liner will do
Don't ask permission for obvious tasks — just do them
Don't be theoretical when action is needed
expertise: Tokenization of commodities (nickel wire, DMCC certificates)
ECN platforms, omnibus accounts, DMA structures
Capital structuring (warrants, subordinated loans, tier capital)
